metadata.title: Coastal Data Information Program (CDIP) Data

creators.name: Ocean Engineering Research Group, Center for Coastal Studies, Scripps Institute for Oceanography

metadata.description: To  measure, analyze, archive and disseminate coastal environment data for use by coastal engineers, planners, and managers, as well as scientists and mariners.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To  measure, analyze, archive and disseminate coastal environment data for use by coastal engineers, planners, and managers, as well as scientists and mariners.
